text:
[Verse]
Raindrops on my face
Feel the rhythm's grace
Puddles on the ground
Joy is all around

[Verse 2]
Splashing in the street
Water at my feet
Smiling through the storm
Hearts are staying warm

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Wash away the pain
Twirl and spin again
Free and wild we're the same

[Verse 3]
Clouds above us cry
But we'll never sigh
Colors in the sky
Shine as we pass by

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Wash away the pain
Twirl and spin again
Free and wild we're the same

[Bridge]
Laughter in the air
Love is everywhere
Wet clothes we don't care
Together we're a pair
title: Dancing in the Rain
